programme.title: Monday Night Football
programme.Sub-title: Atlanta Falcons at Las Vegas Raiders
programme.desc: Atlanta Falcons (6-7) at Las Vegas Raiders (2-11). From Allegiant Stadium. Atlantas Bijan Robinson (977 yards) and Tyler Allgeier (508) are a dynamic rushing duo with no fumbles on the season, facing a banged-up Raiders defense anchored by workhorse LB Robert Spillane. With Aidan OConnell ailing, Las Vegas QB Desmond Ridder could see action against his former team, which is on a 5-0 series run.

programme.title: Boca Raton Bowl
programme.desc: Western Kentucky (8-5) vs. James Madison (8-4) in the 11th Boca Raton Bowl. From FAU Stadium in Boca Raton, Fla. QB Alonza Barnett III and the JMU Dukes bid for their first bowl victory, working from the foundation set the last two years by now-Indiana coach Curt Cignetti. C-USA runner-up WKU has built a 7-3 bowl record, including wins over Sun Belt teams the last three years.

programme.title: LA Bowl
programme.desc: California (6-6) vs. UNLV (10-3) in the fourth LA Bowl. From SoFi Stadium in Los Angeles. ACC first-teamers Teddye Buchanan (LB) and Nohl Williams (CB) head the defense for Cal, which looks to follow Fresno State and UCLA as home-state winners of this game. The Mountain West runner-up Rebels are in just their third bowl game since 2000, when they last won a postseason game, in the Las Vegas Bowl.

Go behind the scenes with the executives and matchmakers of Top Rank as they shape the business of boxing.

programme.title: Dexter: Original Sin
programme.desc: Young Dexter Morgan struggles to keep his urges in check while navigating life with his father, Harry, and sister, high-school senior Deb. After Harry has a health scare, Dexter realizes it may finally be time to fulfill his destiny. Series premiere.

programme.title: Killing Eve
programme.desc: Villanelles mission is proving anything but straightforward, forcing her to take drastic measures. Meanwhile, Eve makes a shocking discovery, which leads her right to Villanelle and an electrifying confrontation from which neither will emerge unscathed.

programme.title: Dexter: Original Sin
programme.desc: Young Dexter Morgan struggles to keep his urges in check while navigating life with his father, Harry, and sister, high-school senior Deb. After Harry has a health scare, Dexter realizes it may finally be time to fulfill his destiny. Series premiere.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Henry and Martian wade into a diplomatic incident with the Belarusian delegation. Dropped into her mission by Naomi, Danny walks a tightrope. Poppy and Martian attempt a fresh start. Osman threatens Sami.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder (2008)
programme.desc: In this raucous action-movie spoof, actors (including Ben Stiller, Robert Downey Jr. and Jack Black) are on location in the jungle playing Vietnam War soldiers when they run afoul of real-life drug traders. Stiller co-wrote the screenplay and also directed. Nick Nolte, Tom Cruise, Matthew McConaughey, Steve Coogan.

programme.title: Coach Carter (2005)
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson brings his A-game to this inspiring and eloquent fact-based sports drama. He plays a no-nonsense California high-school basketball coach who demands that his cocky, undisciplined players be responsible on and off the court. Rob Brown, Robert Richard, Debbi Morgan, Ashanti, Rick Gonzalez, Antwon Tanner, Nana Gbewonyo, Denise Dowse, Mel Winkler.

programme.title: Love the Coopers (2015)
programme.desc: Four generations of the Cooper family gather to spend Christmas Eve together. When unexpected events disrupt the evening, they must reaffirm their bonds and embrace the spirit of the season.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You (2014)
programme.desc: An adaptation of Jonathan Troppers novel surrounding a dysfunctional family reunion following their fathers funeral.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A young lawyer discovers the firm hes hired into is controlled by the mob and attempts to escape from their clutches.

programme.title: L.A. Confidential (1997)
programme.desc: Adaptation of James Ellroys novel about police corruption in 1950s Los Angeles, focusing on how three cops are affected by a diner shootout.

programme.title: John Grishams The Rainmaker (1997)
programme.desc: In this gripping adaptation, a naive young lawyer and his experienced partner take on a corrupt insurance company in the court case of a lifetime.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
programme.desc: A violent crime opus set in 1980 West Texas, where a man finds a fortune in drug loot, and tries to dodge a sheriff and a bounty hunter out to recover it.

programme.title: The Italian Job (2003)
programme.desc: A team of high-class thieves set out to avenge their mentors death with the help of his daughter. The plan consists of them stealing a fortune in gold, having it pilfered from them and then trying to get it back.

programme.title: Dexter: Original Sin
programme.desc: Young Dexter Morgan struggles to keep his urges in check while navigating life with his father, Harry, and sister, high-school senior Deb. After Harry has a health scare, Dexter realizes it may finally be time to fulfill his destiny. Series premiere.

programme.title: The Dead Dont Hurt (2023)
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Henry and Martian wade into a diplomatic incident with the Belarusian delegation. Dropped into her mission by Naomi, Danny walks a tightrope. Poppy and Martian attempt a fresh start. Osman threatens Sami.

programme.title: Get Rich Or Die Tryin (2005)
programme.desc: Drama about a street kid turned drug dealer turned rap artist, loosely based on the life of hip-hop star Calvin "50 Cent" Jackson.

programme.title: Faster (2010)
programme.desc: Driver seeks revenge on the man responsible for his brothers death, but a devoted cop gets wind of his plan and tries to stop him from carrying it out. Meanwhile, a hit man attempts to end Drivers life before he completes his task.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A young lawyer discovers the firm hes hired into is controlled by the mob and attempts to escape from their clutches.

programme.title: Cocktail (1988)
programme.desc: In this tasty romantic drama, a cocky skirt-chasing bartender drops out of law school in search of a top-shelf lifestyle. Later, his romance with a pretty waitress is threatened by an alluring fashion executive who wants him all to herself.

programme.title: Days of Thunder (1990)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise guns the engine in this action drama about a stock-car racer.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: Thomas has the ideal life with a good job, a house, and a loving family. All this is threatened when his mistress is found dead in his swimming pool on the same day his family throws a surprise birthday party in the same backyard. As he scrambles to maintain his life as it has been, Thomas soon discovers that he might not be the only one hiding something.

programme.title: The Good Liar (2019)
programme.desc: Roy Courtnay has made a successful living as a con artist. He crosses paths with wealthy widow Betty McLeish, who seems like the perfect opportunity for an easy job. However, the deeper Roy falls into Bettys life, the deeper his emotions run for her. What he thought would be a straightforward swindle unfolds into a significantly more complicated moment in his life.

programme.title: Pig (2021)
programme.desc: A truffle hunter who lives alone in the Oregon wilderness must visit Portland to find the mysterious person who stole his beloved foraging pig.

programme.title: Contagion (2011)
programme.desc: In this ensemble thriller about a virus that quickly becomes a global pandemic, a husband copes with the sudden death of his wife, while a doctor puts herself at risk to find a cure and an activist blogger stokes societys paranoia.

programme.title: Flight (2012)
programme.desc: A veteran pilot successfully lands a commercial airliner following a disastrous malfunction and is hailed by the public as a hero, but a subsequent investigation threatens to expose his history of substance abuse.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma (2007)
programme.desc: Remake of the 1957 Western about a rancher escorting an outlaw to a rendezvous with the law, while the latters henchmen try to head them off and free their leader.

programme.title: The Hateful Eight (2015)
programme.desc: A bounty hunter and his captured fugitive seek refuge from a blizzard in a mountain cabin along with six other distrustful travellers.

programme.title: Dexter: Original Sin
programme.desc: Young Dexter Morgan struggles to keep his urges in check while navigating life with his father, Harry, and sister, high-school senior Deb. After Harry has a health scare, Dexter realizes it may finally be time to fulfill his destiny. Series premiere.

programme.title: Bodies Bodies Bodies (2022)
programme.desc: As an intense tropical storm bears down on a remote family estate, a cohort of privileged, out-of-touch twenty-somethings plans to spare no expense for an explosive party. Yet, their evening of drunken merriment soon takes a sinister turn when an innocent game yields fatal consequences, all the while exposing the fake personalities that lie beneath the friends carefully curated exteriors.

programme.title: Scary Movie 2 (2001)
programme.desc: A demented professor leads a group of students to haunted-house scares by tricking them into thinking they are participating for a school project.

programme.title: Scary Movie 3 (2003)
programme.desc: This sequel spoofs "Signs", "The Ring", "The Matrix Reloaded", "The Others", "The Sixth Sense" and "8 Mile".

programme.title: The Fabulous Four (2024)
programme.desc: Three lifelong female friends, a tight-knit group who have preserved their friendship for decades since their college years, embark on a trip to Florida with a specific reason to become bridesmaids. Never mind that they are all over sixty years of age. They are attending their college friends surprise wedding. However, as they spend time rekindling friendship moments and memories, other issues also emerge.

programme.title: Flashdance (1983)
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh steel-mill welder by day and an exotic dancer by night dreams of a ballet career.

programme.title: Dear Santa (2024)
programme.desc: Liam writes to Santa asking him to prove that hes real. But Liam is dyslexic and accidentally sends his letter to Satan instead, who shows up at Liams house, excited to have his first fanboy letter and wanting a little of Liams soul.

programme.title: Old School (2003)
programme.desc: In an effort to recapture their youth, three disillusioned men start a frat house, then run afoul of the dean. Luke Wilson and Will Ferrell star in this uneven "Animal House" rip-off from director Todd Phillips, who co-wrote the script.

programme.title: The Painter (2024)
programme.desc: Peter, an ex-CIA operative, reluctantly finds himself face-to-face with the past he tried to run from when he unexpectedly encounters an enigmatic young woman from his past. As he and the woman suddenly find themselves the target of both a ruthless assassin and a paramilitary black ops force, he easily taps back into the training that he thought he had forgotten for good.

programme.title: Shaft (2000)
programme.desc: Dynamic Samuel L. Jackson stars as New York City cop John Shaft, who quits the force and decides to dispense his own brand of vigilante justice against a racist killer (Christian Bale) and a Dominican drug lord (Jeffrey Wright). Richard Roundtree, who played the original John Shaft in three 70s crime dramas, has a cameo as Jacksons uncle and namesake. Busta Rhymes, Vanessa Williams, Dan Hedaya.

programme.desc: Confess, Fletch is a reboot of the classic crime-comedy film. This time, Fletch becomes the main suspect in a series of murders while investigating thieves that stole his girlfriends art collection. To exonerate himself, Fletch begins his own investigation into the murders and discovers a lot of people could be the guilty party, including his art collecting girlfriend.

programme.desc: Will Sawyer makes a living assessing the security of the worlds tallest buildings, but finds his safety compromised when the skyscraper hes made his home is attacked by terrorists. With his family trapped inside the blaze, and with Will himself framed for the attack, he must fight the fire to save his family, whilst also attempting to prove his innocence.

programme.desc: Will Sawyer makes a living assessing the security of the worlds tallest buildings, but finds his safety compromised when the skyscraper hes made his home is attacked by terrorists. programme.title: Scare Tactics
programme.desc: A powerful mind lays waste to a military lab and a legendary land owner terrorizes possible buyers.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Facing a murder charge, the life of real-estate heir Robert Durst is traced via interviews with his longtime friends, who discuss his early years, his marriage, and his career.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.Sub-title: The Life and Death Of Princess Diana - Part 1
programme.desc: Insights into the real story of the very private royal, including a look at Dianas troubled marriage, her turbulent life in the royal family and the investigation into her death.

programme.Sub-title: The Life And Death Of Princess Diana - Part 2

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Atwater and Burgess respond to a shooting involving a Latin gang, and they discover that the only witness is Olinskys daughter. In order to protect her, Voight takes over the case, and Ruzek and Burgess go on an undercover mission that may lead to clues in the shooting.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Halstead is threatened with losing his job after Lonnie Rodiger is found dead. Meanwhile, Severide and Clarke discover the body of a doctor who helped put many criminals behind bars; Sumner gets a chance to prove her worth; and Lindsay gets a moment alone with Severide.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight and the team investigate a gang-related case involving several deaths and millions of dollars in stolen cash. Meanwhile, Burgess helps the unit in an effort to prove her worth; and Platt asks Ruzek for assistance.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The Intelligence Unit works furiously to find the people responsible for an explosion at Chicago Medical. Voight and his team use their own angles and connections; Lindsay and Antonio interrogate doctors who operated on an ambassador from Syria; and Olinsky finds a lead. Meanwhile, the team realises that additional bombs may still be active; and Burgess waits to learn about her nieces fate.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl who was brutally beaten, raped and killed shares the same dog-paw tattoo as two other young female homicide victims. Despite warnings from Stabler, Dani becomes overly involved in the case.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While searching for the woman responsible for handcuffing two traumatised adolescents in the back of a van, the detectives turn up evidence that leads them to suspect that many foster children are being put in danger. Also, Dani makes a decision about her future with the Special Victims Unit.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teens drinking-related death leads to four students who host secret binge parties and communicate the details on their websites, Stabler seeks help from his daughter to find out where the next party will be held.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson hears from her half-brother, who is on the run because of sexual-assault charges. He continues to claim his innocence but evidence keeps piling up against him, and Benson reluctantly agrees to help in the federal investigation.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenager dies during what appears to be a play fight with his best friend, and the incident is caught on tape, but additional information sends the investigation in a different direction.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A volunteer at a rehab center is killed, and her death may be linked to the man she was helping: an Iraqi suffering from injuries that may have been caused by torture techniques employed by an American-hired company.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A womans body is found mutilated in a lift shaft, and the crime appears to be a copycat killing, reproducing the techniques of a jailed serial killer with a cult following. As detectives investigate further, Benson receives threats that jeopardise the entire department, prompting the captain to order her off the case.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The case of a murdered nanny leads detectives to her online love interest, but her employers also fall under suspicion when infidelity is uncovered. Meanwhile, Stablers unborn son is in serious danger after a family tragedy.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A wealthy teenagers murder leads detectives to the charismatic and violent leader of a homeless group calling themselves a family. The probe turns up evidence suggesting the man may be responsible for other deaths, including those of his own "children" and first wife.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A body found in Central Park appears to be the latest victim of a serial killer, forcing Benson to work with an FBI agent familiar with the murders profile. But the agent also has a personal interest in the case: her mentor committed suicide over his frustration at not being able to stop the deaths.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A robbery at a sperm bank has Benson and Stabler racing to recover fertilised embryos before it is too late. The investigation into a long list of suspects eventually leads to a pair of publicity-seeking extremists, and to Bensons personal fear of missing out on motherhood.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson poses as a prison inmate to expose a corrupt guard suspected of stealing evidence in a rape case.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Robin Williams guest stars as engineer Merritt Rook, who poses as a police officer on the phone to trick people into committing criminal acts. Rooks clever self-defence at trial sets him free, leading to publicity and followers stemming from his anti-authority message.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A pregnant woman is found raped and dead in a house fire, and attempts to interview her fiancé, a member of a wealthy coffee-trading family, are hampered by his lawyer. But family secrets are uncovered as the detectives dig for clues and discover an affair between the deceased and her future father-in-law.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Stabler gets a call to help catch a trespasser, hes shocked when the clues lead him to a suspect in his own family: his daughter Kathleen. Things get so bad that he seeks help from his estranged mother as he tries to save his daughter.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A famous astronaut is found dead in Battery Park. The investigation hits a dead end, so Stabler seeks help from an old mentor, Dick Finley, a NASA astronaut and former colleague of the victim.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A burglary occurs at a cyber-security company, but Callen is forced to steer clear of the investigation when Hetty tells him that his girlfriend, Joelle, is one of the lead witnesses. Meanwhile, the team discuss their personal holiday travel plans.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A suspected North Korean spy is poisoned and hit by a truck carrying Christmas trees. The team investigates and tries to learn who is smuggling spies into the country. Meanwhile, Deeks and Kensi try to include their mothers in their Christmas plans; and Hetty notices that Granger isnt in a holiday mood.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As a string of break-in assaults grows more violent, the cops investigate an online incel group to identify a suspect.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A psychic, to whom Stabler takes an instant dislike, is anxious to help the police in the abduction of a teenager.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a travel writer is found murdered, the investigation involves his landlady, her teen daughter and the mothers beau.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation of a multimillionaires killing involves bisexual infidelities and a number of Russians.

programme.desc: When guests arrive for a party, they find the hosts have been assaulted, one of them fatally.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler respond to the accusation of a mother who claims that her 15-year-old daughter was raped by a boyfriend.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A successful lawyers secret life as an exotic dancer is revealed to her boss and her fiancé after she and a stripper friend are found murdered.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler becomes involved in a murder case that leads to revelations of infidelity and obsession among a group of friends, one of whom is the victims husband. Also, Stabler learns that Benson is back in town and asks for her help in the investigation.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler question the CEO of an online dating service after discovering a members body stuffed inside a suitcase.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man wakes up next to a dead woman and has no memory of who she is or what happened. The investigation takes Benson and Stabler in a variety of directions.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A womans body is found in a fountain, and soon its discovered that she ingested toxic mushrooms. The investigation yields a prime suspect whos a professor and an aggressive activist.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A family mans stabbing leads to the exposure of his secret pastime at a swingers club. Benson and Stabler then go undercover at the club, where they encounter a flirtatious woman with a possessive boyfriend.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman is questioned by police after her newly adopted baby is found alone on a playground. Detectives then investigate her fiancé, a man with a sinister past whos also dating the babys nanny.

programme.desc: A man witnesses his wifes rape and kidnapping while video-chatting with her on his way home from a business trip. The abductors seek a ransom, and the case grows more complex as detectives probe deeper.

programme.desc: Police look for a missing boy who needs insulin, and soon hes seen with a criminal duo who have a history of child endangerment and pornography. Meanwhile, Bensons professional trajectory goes off course because of a personal matter.

programme.desc: Benson tries to help two teenaged sisters after their father is killed. Meanwhile, Rollins goes into labor.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates the disappearance of a Navy lieutenant commander who was working with the NSA on foreign cyber threats. Later, the team celebrates the holidays together.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates a ransomware attack that takes out the entire power grid for west LA and paralyses the city. Also, as the first holiday season since the death of Sams wife nears, he struggles to find the best way for his family to celebrate.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: In the Season 8 premiere, a young woman refuses to cooperate during Bensons investigation of her brutal attack and rape, which seems to be connected to her involvement with a radical environmental group.

programme.desc: A rape victim loses her life while confronting her attacker, who assaulted her two separate times. Also, one of the young men who killed Danis husband dies, and the other murderer tries to contact her from prison.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While working the case of a kidnapped girl found in the boot of a stolen car, Stabler is injured by a suspect, a schizophrenic artist believed to be a serial rapist. The trial brings up a dark moment in Novaks past, which seems to affect her judgement.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenage girls murder appears to be connected to the world of ultimate fighting when a fighters DNA is found at the scene. But more evidence leads to two brothers, who could be responsible for the death.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler probe the murder of an investment banker. Elsewhere, Benson starts dating a newspaper editor, but his work conflicts with her position at the department.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler seek Warners help while investigating a case of a baby with AIDS, and soon the investigation points them towards a homeopathic doctor with questionable ethics who had prescribed ineffective vitamins for the baby.

programme.desc: Stabler goes undercover to break up an animal-smuggling ring, and he gets help from a group insider, hip-hop artist Gots Money. However, this assignment leads to complications in Stablers marriage.

programme.desc: A young rape victim whose throat was cut draws a picture of the devil in an attempt to identify her attacker. While investigating the crime, detectives question a local priest whom neighbours claim is a devil worshipper.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman reports the disappearance of her 2-year-old granddaughter, but a child-abduction alert fails to yield progress. Detectives then shift their focus to the girls irresponsible young mother, who becomes their prime suspect.

programme.desc: A teenage girl is beaten up after sending out nude photos of herself via text message. She then gets arrested for producing and distributing child pornography, and faces a harsh sentence from a judge.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The prime suspect in a child-rape case seeks amnesty by offering to give up the leader of a civil-rights group that supports child-adult sexual relationships.

programme.desc: Stabler works with Benson on a rape case until he gets sidetracked by the problems of his son, who has fallen into serious trouble with his best friend, a recovering drug addict.
